name: Archmage Hellmut

skills.name: Arcane Dynamo
skills.description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Fills this Championâ€™s Turn Meter by 10%. Fills the Turn Meter by 20% if this attack is critical.
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Damage +5%
Level 5: Damage +10%
Damage Multiplier: 4.8 ATK

skills.name: Timeslip (Cooldown: 4 turns)
skills.description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Also, attack all other enemies if the first attack is critical. Each hit has a 50% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn. After attacking, decrease the Turn Meters of each enemy without a [Stun] debuff by 20%.
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Level 4: Damage +5%
Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Level 6: Damage +10%
Level 7: Buff/Debuff Chance +15%
Level 8: Cooldown -1
Damage Multiplier: 6 ATK (Target), 3.5 ATK (AoE)

skills.name: Psychic Guidance (Cooldown: 5 turns)
skills.description:
Places a 30% [Increase SPD] buff, a 30% [Increase C.RATE] buff and a 30% [Increase C.DMG] buff on all allies for 2 turns.
Level 2: Cooldown -1
Level 3: Cooldown -1
